title: Allen Epley from The Life and Times/Shiner - Episode 128
itunes:title: Allen Epley from The Life and Times/Shiner - Episode 128
description:
Hey everyone! I am really excited to bring you this chat with Alley Epley, the guitarist/vocalist for The Life and Times & Shiner. While his bands aren't widely known, they are HIGHLY influential to indie rock, punk and hardcore. We discuss how to keep music fresh, The Blue Man Group and coming from a musical home. In this episode, we also check in with our contributor Dave Anthony (from The AV Club) about some recent releases that are worth your time to check out. Please contribute to the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
